Text: termination letterNo Q Does this letter look okay Our legal department in Calgary does not do financial termination letters I got a copy of this from Joe Hunter Thanks Cindy Enron Canada Corp Canterra Tower Third Avenue SW Calgary Alberta Canada TP H Phone Fax TERMINATION AGREEMENT NK This TERMINATION AGREEMENT dated as of October the Agreement is entered into between Enron Canada Corp ECC and Due West Resou rces Inc Counterparty W I T N E S S E T H WHEREAS ECC and Counterparty entered into an Agreement together with th e General Terms and Conditions of Confirmation as set forth in Annex A and an y other attachments hereto collectively the Confirmation dated as o f October WHEREAS ECC and Counterparty have entered into Contract NoNK dated May the Transaction and WHEREAS ECC and Counterparty desire to terminate the Transaction NOW THEREFORE in consideration of the premises and of the mutual agreements herein contained the parties hereto agree as follows Termination and Release As of and from October the Termination Date the Transaction shall be terminated and once th e Termination Fee is paid both ENA and Counterparty shall be fully released from all rights duties and obligations under the Transaction Termination Consideration In consideration for such Termination and Release ECC and Counterparty agree to enter into Transaction number Q as attached hereto Representation Each party hereby represents and warrants to the other s that the execution delivery and performance hereof by it are within its corporate powers and have been duly authorized by all necessary corporate or other action and that this Agreement constitutes its legal valid and bindi ng obligation Governing Law This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Texas Counterparts This Agreement may be executed in any number of counterparts each of which shall be deemed an original IN WITNESS WHEREOF the parties hereto have executed this Agreement as of the date first above written ENRON NORTH AMERICA CORP By Name Title COUNTERPARTY By Name Title
